Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Reroute at Lawrence/Kenmore
ShortDescription: 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Wilson (Red Line), Sheridan and Lawrence due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Kenmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#81 Lawrencebuses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Wilson (Red Line), Sheridan and Lawrence due to, street blockage, near Lawrence/Kenmore.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Addison. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem at Addison.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
